collection.Title: Castle in the Sky
collection.Plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
collection.Cast: Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui

collection.Title: Back to the Future
collection.Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
collection.Cast: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

collection.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
collection.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
collection.Cast: Robert Downey, Jr.Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo

collection.Title: The Avengers
collection.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
collection.Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

collection.Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
collection.Plot: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, in which she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.
collection.Cast: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis

collection.Title: The Suicide Squad
collection.Plot: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.
collection.Cast: Margot Robbie, Idris Elba, John Cena

collection.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
collection.Plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
collection.Cast: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

collection.Title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
collection.Plot: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.
collection.Cast: Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot

collection.Title: Dune
collection.Plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

collection.Title: The King
collection.Plot: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies. Now the young king must navigate palace politics, the war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life.
collection.Cast: Tom Glynn-Carney, Gábor Czap, Tom Fisher
